statements: UPDATE QuantumErrorTracking SET correction_strategy = 'Revert' WHERE quantum_circuit_id = 1 AND error_type = 'Bit Flip';
UPDATE QuantumErrorTracking SET error_type = 'Phase Flip', correction_strategy = 'Retry' WHERE quantum_circuit_id = 2;
UPDATE QuantumErrorTracking SET error_type = 'X-gate error', correction_strategy = 'Re-run circuit' WHERE quantum_circuit_id = 123;
UPDATE QuantumErrorTracking SET correction_strategy = 'Check parity bits', error_type = 'Bit-flip error' WHERE quantum_circuit_id = 456;
UPDATE ErrorTypes SET error_name = 'Syntax Error', error_description = 'A type of error caused by incorrect syntax in the code' WHERE error_id = 1;
UPDATE CorrectionStrategies SET strategy_description = 'A method to fix errors in the code by analyzing and correcting the logic' WHERE strategy_name = 'Debugging';
UPDATE ErrorTypes SET error_description = 'Updated description 1' WHERE error_id = 1;
UPDATE CorrectionStrategies SET strategy_description = 'New strategy for errors' WHERE strategy_id = 3;
UPDATE Errors SET error_type = 'Syntax Error' WHERE error_id = 1;
UPDATE CorrectionStrategies SET strategy_name = 'Manual Fix' WHERE strategy_id = 2;
UPDATE Errors SET error_type='Runtime' WHERE error_id=101;
UPDATE CorrectionStrategies SET strategy_details='Detailed instructions for fixing the error' WHERE strategy_id=201;
UPDATE Errors SET error_description = 'New description' WHERE error_id = 1;
UPDATE Correction_Strategies SET strategy_name = 'Updated Strategy' WHERE strategy_id = 3;
UPDATE Errors SET error_description = 'Updated error description' WHERE error_id = 1;
UPDATE Correction_Strategies SET strategy_description = 'New strategy description' WHERE strategy_id = 2;
UPDATE ErrorTypes SET error_name = 'Syntax Error' WHERE error_id = 1;
UPDATE QuantumCircuits SET error_id = 2, strategy_id = 1 WHERE circuit_id = 3;
UPDATE QuantumCircuits SET error_id = 1, strategy_id = 2 WHERE circuit_id = 10;
UPDATE CircuitErrors SET error_id = 2, timestamp = '2022-12-01 10:30:00' WHERE circuit_error_id = 5;
